b:if.script: /**/ function get_text(el) {ret = ""; var length = el.childNodes.length; for(var i = 0; i < length; i++) {var node = el.childNodes[i]; if(node.nodeType != 8) {ret += node.nodeType != 1 ? node.nodeValue : get_text(node);} } return ret;} var words = get_text(document.getElementById('postBody')); var count = words.split(' ').length; var avg = 200; var counted = count / avg; var maincount = Math.round(counted); document.getElementById("readTime").innerHTML = maincount + " minute read"; /**/

b:if.cond: data:post.labels and ((data:widget.sectionId in ["ft-post"]) or (data:widget.sectionId == "sidebar" and data:i == 0))
